languages.text: "Это — разумное деловое предложение. От почтенной Инцендии Чорда я не получу и этого — она бы не только ограбила нас, но и навязала бы свои порядки. Потому я согласен". {n}Помолчав, Владайм с сухой улыбкой добавляет:{/n} "А вы опасны, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "Это — разумное деловое предложение. От почтенной Инцендии Чорда я не получу и этого — она бы не только ограбила нас, но и навязала бы свои порядки. Потому я согласен". {n}Помолчав, Владайм с сухой улыбкой добавляет.{/n} "А вы опасны, Ваше Благородие".

languages.text: "That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Это — разумное деловое предложение. От почтенной Инцендии Чорда я не получу и этого — она бы не только ограбила нас, но и навязала бы свои порядки. Потому я согласен". {n}Помолчав, Владайм с сухой улыбкой добавляет:{/n} "А вы опасны, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: 「合理的なビジネスの提案だね。敬愛するインセンディア・チョーダでもこれほどの報酬は期待できない…あの方なら私達から奪い取って、自分の権威を主張したさ。合意するよ」{n}ヴラダイムは立ち止まり、乾いた笑みを浮かべてこう付け加えた。{/n}「君は実に危険な人物だ、陛下」
languages.original_text: "That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「合理的なビジネスの提案だね。敬愛するインセンディア・チョーダでもこれほどの報酬は期待できない…あの方なら私達から奪い取って、自分の権威を主張したさ。合意するよ」{n}ヴラダイムは立ち止まり、乾いた笑みを浮かべてこう付け加えた。{/n}「君は実に危険な人物だ、陛下」

languages.text: “这是个很合理的商业提议，尊敬的因森蒂娅·库尔达恐怕连这样的条件都不会答应我们。她不仅要把我们劫掠一空，还要维护她自己的权威。因此，我愿意接受这个提案。”{n}他顿了顿，之后干笑着说。{/n}“您可真是个危险的家伙，大人。”
languages.original_text: "That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “这是个很合理的商业提议，尊敬的因森蒂娅·库尔达恐怕连这样的条件都不会答应我们。她不仅要把我们劫掠一空，还要维护她自己的权威。因此，我愿意接受这个提案。”{n}他顿了顿，之后干笑着说。{/n}“您可真是个危险的家伙，大人。”

languages.text: «Una propuesta más que razonable. Ni siquiera habría conseguido tanto de la admirable Incendia Chorda; ella nos habría robado y habría ejercido su propia autoridad. Así que me parece bien». {n}Hace una pausa y añade con una sonrisa seca:{/n} «Hay que andarse con ojo con usted, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: "That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «Una propuesta más que razonable. Ni siquiera habría conseguido tanto de la admirable Incendia Chorda; ella nos habría robado y habría ejercido su propia autoridad. Así que me parece bien». {n}Hace una pausa y añade con una sonrisa seca:{/n} «Hay que andarse con ojo con usted, {mf|milord|milady}».

languages.text: « Cette proposition me semble raisonnable. Je n'en aurais même pas obtenu autant de la part de l'honorable Incendia Chorda ; non seulement elle nous aurait dévalisés, mais elle en aurait aussi profité pour asseoir sa propre autorité. J'accepte donc. » {n}Il s'interrompt un instant, avant d'ajouter avec un sourire froid :{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|un homme dangereux|une femme dangereuse}, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « Cette proposition me semble raisonnable. Je n'en aurais même pas obtenu autant de la part de l'honorable Incendia Chorda ; non seulement elle nous aurait dévalisés, mais elle en aurait aussi profité pour asseoir sa propre autorité. J'accepte donc. » {n}Il s'interrompt un instant, avant d'ajouter avec un sourire froid :{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|un homme dangereux|une femme dangereuse}, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: "Das ist ein vernünftiger Vorschlag. So viel hätte ich von der geschätzten Incendia Chorda niemals bekommen – sie hätte uns ausgeraubt und ihre eigene Autorität durchgesetzt. Und deshalb bin ich einverstanden." {n}Er macht eine Pause und fügt dann mit einem emotionslosen Lächeln hinzu:{/n} "Ihr seid {mf|ein gefährlicher Mann, Eure Lordschaft|eine gefährliche Frau, Eure Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein vernünftiger Vorschlag. So viel hätte ich von der geschätzten Incendia Chorda niemals bekommen – sie hätte uns ausgeraubt und ihre eigene Autorität durchgesetzt. Und deshalb bin ich einverstanden." {n}Er macht eine Pause und fügt dann mit einem emotionslosen Lächeln hinzu:{/n} "Ihr seid {mf|ein gefährlicher Mann, Eure Lordschaft|eine gefährliche Frau, Eure Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: "Makul bir teklif. Saygıdeğer İncendia Chorda'dan bu kadarını bile alamazdım, hem bizi soyar hem de kendi egemenliğini kurardı. Anlaştık." {n}Duruyor, sonra kuru bir gülümsemeyle ekliyor.{/n} "Tehlikeli bir {mf|adamsınız|kadınsınız} {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "That is a reasonable business proposal. I wouldn't have even gotten this much from the esteemed Incendia Chorda — she would've both robbed us and asserted her own authority. And so I agree." {n}He pauses, then adds with a dry smile,{/n} "You're a dangerous {mf|man|woman}, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Makul bir teklif. Saygıdeğer Incendia Chorda'dan bu kadarını bile alamazdım, hem bizi soyar hem de kendi otoritesini savunurdu. Anlaştık." {n}Duruyor, sonra kuru bir gülümsemeyle ekliyor.{/n} "Tehlikeli bir {mf|adamsınız|kadınsınız} {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
